languages.text: Тень же Домин осталась подле трона Неумирающего, и не видел ее более никто. Домин же, увидев Смерть прежде срока, прош{mf|ел|ла} туда и вернул{mf|ся|ась} обратно, чтобы принести нам мудрость: не жалей о том, что ушло в Смерть, ибо сие есть правильно. Ищи ценность в том, что есть у живых, ибо однажды оно закончится. Он — есть Смерть.

And the Domin's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. He is Death.
languages.original_text: Тень же Домин осталась подле трона Неумирающего, и не видел ее более никто. Домин же, увидев Смерть прежде срока, прош{mf|ел|ла} туда и вернул{mf|ся|ась} обратно, чтобы принести нам мудрость: не жалей о том, что ушло в Смерть, ибо сие есть правильно. Ищи ценность в том, что есть у живых, ибо однажды оно закончится. Он — есть Смерть.

traits.locale_text: And the Enim's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and was not seen since. And the Enim, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, went there and came back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on into Death, for that is the right way. Find value in what the living possess, for it will run out one day. Ayen Kaen Dho.

And the Enim's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and was not seen since. And the Enim, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, went there and came back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on into Death, for that is the right way. Find value in what the living possess, for it will run out one day. Ayen Kaen Dho.

And the Enim's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Enim, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. Ayen Kaen Dho.

And the Enim's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Enim, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. Ayen Kaen Dho.

And the Domin's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. He is Death.

And the Domin's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. He is Death.

languages.text: Und der Schatten {mf|des|der} Domin blieb neben dem Thron des Todlosen und wurde seitdem nicht mehr gesehen. Und so kam es, dass {mf|der|die} Domin, {mf|der|die} den Tod vor {mf|seiner|ihrer} Zeit gesehen hatte, dorthin und zurück reiste, um uns diese Worte der Weisheit zu bringen: Bereut nicht, was dem Tod übergeben wurde, denn das ist der richtige Pfad. Findet Wert in dem, was die Lebenden besitzen, denn eines Tages wird es nicht mehr bestehen. Er ist der Tod.
languages.original_text: And the Domin's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Und der Schatten {mf|des|der} Domin blieb neben dem Thron des Todlosen und wurde seitdem nicht mehr gesehen. Und so kam es, dass {mf|der|die} Domin, {mf|der|die} den Tod vor {mf|seiner|ihrer} Zeit gesehen hatte, dorthin und zurück reiste, um uns diese Worte der Weisheit zu bringen: Bereut nicht, was dem Tod übergeben wurde, denn das ist der richtige Pfad. Findet Wert in dem, was die Lebenden besitzen, denn eines Tages wird es nicht mehr bestehen. Er ist der Tod.

languages.text: Y la sombra de{mf|l| la} Domin permaneció junto al trono del Inmortal, y no se la volvió a ver. Así fue que {mf|el|la} Domin, habiendo presenciado la Muerte antes de que llegara su hora, viajó allí y volvió con estas sabias palabras: no lamentes aquello que la Muerte reclama, pues es el sendero correcto. Busca el valor en los vivos, pues algún día dejará de existir. Él es la muerte.
languages.original_text: And the Domin's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: Y la sombra de{mf|l| la} Domin permaneció junto al trono del Inmortal, y no se la volvió a ver. Así fue que {mf|el|la} Domin, habiendo presenciado la Muerte antes de que llegara su hora, viajó allí y volvió con estas sabias palabras: no lamentes aquello que la Muerte reclama, pues es el sendero correcto. Busca el valor en los vivos, pues algún día dejará de existir. Él es la muerte.

languages.text: そして、ドミンの影は不死の者の王座のそばにとどまり、それ以来二度と見られることはなかった。それ故に、自身の時間が来る前に死を見たことで、ドミンはそこを行き来して我らに知恵の言葉をもたらした。死に至ったものを悔いるな、それが正しい道なのだから。生きているものが持っているものに価値を見出せ。いずれそれがなくなってしまうのだから。彼は死だ。
languages.original_text: And the Domin's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: そして、ドミンの影は不死の者の王座のそばにとどまり、それ以来二度と見られることはなかった。それ故に、自身の時間が来る前に死を見たことで、ドミンはそこを行き来して我らに知恵の言葉をもたらした。死に至ったものを悔いるな、それが正しい道なのだから。生きているものが持っているものに価値を見出せ。いずれそれがなくなってしまうのだから。彼は死だ。

languages.text: 而秘者的影子始终停留在不死之神的王座旁，再也没有出现过。秘者在大限将临之前，就亲眼见过了死亡的景象。{mf|他|她}从亡者的国度归来，为我们带来了充满智慧的话语——切莫留恋已经被死亡带走的东西，因为这才是它们的归宿。把目光放在生者身上，从他们所拥有的一切之中寻找价值吧，因为总有一天，生者将会消逝。祂便是死亡本身。
languages.original_text: And the Domin's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: 而秘者的影子始终停留在不死之神的王座旁，再也没有出现过。秘者在大限将临之前，就亲眼见过了死亡的景象。{mf|他|她}从亡者的国度归来，为我们带来了充满智慧的话语——切莫留恋已经被死亡带走的东西，因为这才是它们的归宿。把目光放在生者身上，从他们所拥有的一切之中寻找价值吧，因为总有一天，生者将会消逝。祂便是死亡本身。

languages.text: L'ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin demeura aux côtés du trône de l'Immortel et n'a jamais été revue depuis. C'est ainsi que {mf|le|la} Domin, après avoir vu la Mort avant son heure, voyagea jusqu'à nous pour nous transmettre cette sagesse : ne regrettez pas ceux qui ont rencontré la Mort, car tel est le droit chemin. Réjouissez-vous de ce que possèdent les vivants, car un jour, tout cela disparaîtra. Il incarne la mort.
languages.original_text: And the Domin's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. He is Death.

traits.locale_text: L'ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin demeura aux côtés du trône de l'Immortel et n'a jamais été revue depuis. C'est ainsi que {mf|le|la} Domin, après avoir vu la Mort avant son heure, voyagea jusqu'à nous pour nous transmettre cette sagesse : ne regrettez pas ceux qui ont rencontré la Mort, car tel est le droit chemin. Réjouissez-vous de ce que possèdent les vivants, car un jour, tout cela disparaîtra. Il incarne la mort.

languages.text: Böylece Domin'in gölgesi, Ölmeyen'in tahtının yanından ayrılmadı ve o günden beri bir daha görülmedi. Kendi vakti dolmadan önce Ölüm'ü gören, oraya seyahat edip bize bu havadislerle bilgelikleri aktarmak için geri dönen işte o Domin'di. Dedi ki Ölüm'e teslim olanlar için üzülmeyin. Zira bu doğru yoldur. Kıymeti yaşamda bulun. Zira bir gün yaşam artık var olmayacaktır. O Ölüm'dür.
languages.original_text: And the Domin's shadow remained beside the Undying One's throne, and has never been seen since. And so it was that the Domin, having seen Death before {mf|his|her} due time, travelled there and back to bring us these words of wisdom: do not regret what has passed on to Death, for that is the right path. Find value in what the living possess, for one day it will be no more. He is Death.
